title: GetInstanceAlarm (Method)
text:
METHOD GetInstanceAlarm :
IAlarm8
Provides access to alarm specific data of instantiated function blocks using the alarm group template that this block is associated with.
Returns NULL if no alarm is found.

rows.Name: pFBInstance
rows.Comment:
Pointer to the template FB instance. Use THIS when inside
the fucntion block.

rows: Alarm ID within the related alarm group template.

rows.Name: usiAlarmGroupID
rows.Comment:
Id of the related alarm group.
Can be used to acknowledge this alarm by using methods like IAlarmHandler.AcknowlegeOneOfGroup.

rows:
Alarm ID of this alarm in the related alarm group.
Can be used to acknowledge this alarm by using methods like IAlarmHandler.AcknowlegeOneOfGroup.
